title: Metamaterial Design Learning through Human-Machine Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment where learners interact with generative AI models using personal devices and evaluate design performance based on experimental data.

learning_goals: Learners can operate a metamaterial structure generation and performance prediction system using conditional variational autoencoders (cVAE) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply three or more optimization strategies in human-machine collaborative design processes by identifying semantic/abstract design features.
Learners can quantitatively evaluate design performance using utopia distance and hypervolume improvement metrics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
